title: How to start solving sums from HC Verma - Quora

response.answer_text: In order to solve H.C Verma,you need to get your basics right. In HCV questions are bit tricky and conceptual so you need understand required concept properly. For concept clarity you can refer to you school/coaching notes,and you can solve example and exercise questions of NCERT book. You can also refer HCV if your theory portion is weak.
